hero.title: Transform Your Business with
hero.subtitle: We accelerate your digital transformation through expert DevOps, cloud migration, and custom software development. Scale faster, deploy smarter, and outpace your competition.

solutions.title: Solutions That Drive Results
solutions.subtitle: From cloud infrastructure to custom applications, we deliver technology solutions that transform how you do business.

devopsCloud.title: DevOps & Cloud Services
devopsCloud.description: Streamline your development pipeline and scale your infrastructure with our comprehensive DevOps and cloud solutions.

softwareDev.title: Software Development
softwareDev.description: Custom applications built with cutting-edge technologies to solve your unique business challenges and drive growth.

industryLeaders.title: Why Industry Leaders Choose Us
industryLeaders.subtitle: We don't just deliver code - we deliver competitive advantages that propel your business forward.

lightningFast.title: Lightning-Fast Delivery
lightningFast.description: Our proven methodologies and experienced teams ensure rapid deployment without compromising quality or security.

enterpriseSecurity.title: Enterprise-Grade Security
enterpriseSecurity.description: Built-in security from day one with compliance standards that meet the most stringent industry requirements.

scalableArchitecture.title: Scalable Architecture
scalableArchitecture.description: Future-proof solutions designed to grow with your business, handling millions of users and transactions effortlessly.

resultsDriven.title: Results-Driven Approach
resultsDriven.description: Every solution is measurable, with clear KPIs and ROI metrics that demonstrate real business impact.

cta.title: Ready to Accelerate Your Digital Transformation?
cta.subtitle: Join tens of companies who've already transformed their operations with our cutting-edge solutions. Let's discuss how we can drive your next breakthrough.

services.cloudMigrationDesc: Seamlessly migrate your infrastructure to the cloud with zero downtime
services.devOpsServiceDesc: Complete DevOps solutions including CI/CD, monitoring, and automation
services.devOpsConsultingDesc: Expert guidance to optimize your development and deployment processes
services.webAppDevDesc: Modern, responsive web applications built with cutting-edge technologies
services.mobileAppDevDesc: Native and cross-platform mobile apps for iOS and Android
services.mvpDevDesc: Rapid prototyping and MVP development to validate your ideas
services.saasDevDesc: Scalable Software-as-a-Service solutions with robust architecture

footer.title: Flowborne
footer.description: Transforming businesses through cutting-edge technology solutions. We accelerate your digital transformation with expert DevOps, cloud services, and custom software development.

newsletter.text: Stay updated with our latest insights and industry trends.

hero.subtitle: We're not just another tech company. We're your strategic partners in digital transformation, combining cutting-edge technology with deep industry expertise to deliver solutions that drive real business results.

journey.title: Our Journey of Innovation
journey.test1: Founded in 2025 by a team of passionate technologists, Flowborne emerged from a simple yet powerful vision: to bridge the gap between complex technology and business success.
journey.test2: What started as a small consulting firm has evolved into a trusted partner for enterprises worldwide. We’ve helped over 150 companies transform their operations, from startups scaling their first products to Fortune 500 companies modernizing legacy systems.
journey.test3: Our approach combines deep technical expertise with strategic business thinking, ensuring every solution we deliver doesn’t just work—it drives measurable growth and competitive advantage.

theBeginning.title: The Beginning
theBeginning.description: Founded with a mission to democratize enterprise-grade technology solutions for businesses of all sizes.

cloudFirst.title: Cloud-First Approach
cloudFirst.description: Pioneered cloud-native solutions, helping 5+ companies migrate to modern infrastructure and achieve 40% cost savings.

devops.title: DevOps Excellence
devops.description: Established our DevOps practice, reducing deployment times by 90% and improving system reliability for enterprise clients.

ai.title: AI & Innovation
ai.description: Expanded into AI-powered solutions and automation, helping clients achieve unprecedented efficiency gains.

expansion.title: Global Expansion
expansion.description: Opened offices in three continents, serving clients across 5 countries with 24/7 support and localized expertise.

coreValues.title: Our Core Values
coreValues.subtitle: These principles guide everything we do, from how we build software to how we build relationships with our clients.

results.title: Results-Driven
results.description: We measure success by your success. Every project is aligned with clear business objectives and measurable outcomes that matter to your bottom line.

innovation.title: Innovation First
innovation.description: We stay ahead of the curve, constantly exploring emerging technologies and methodologies to give our clients a competitive edge.

partnership.title: Partnership Mindset
partnership.description: We’re not just vendors—we’re strategic partners invested in your long-term success. Your challenges become our challenges to solve.

agile.title: Agile Excellence
agile.description: Speed without compromise. We deliver high-quality solutions rapidly through proven agile methodologies and continuous improvement.

security.title: Security & Trust
security.description: Enterprise-grade security is built into everything we do. Your data and intellectual property are protected with the highest standards.

learning.title: Continuous Learning
learning.description: Technology evolves rapidly, and so do we. We invest heavily in our team’s growth and staying current with industry best practices.
